(UNITURN mérőállomás kártyaolvasó)
(cmd line: -i uniturn_kartyaolvaso.txt -t)
(szerszám beállítás)

t1 m d2 h19

yxz
t1
s50
f800

safetop0.200
safebottom0.100
overcut0.300

pre_mill_steps2

#max meredekség polikarbonát 0.05/100mm
emax0.02

fmax900
fmin500
fratio0.7

z1 = 2
z_tekercs = 0.700 # tekercs bemélyítés

c1 = 0.025
c2 = 0.050 #furatok
c3 = 0.075 #vonalak
c4 = 0.100 #keret

w = 56
h = 56
wa = 20
ha = 40

t1r = div($t1d,2)
offset $t1r,$t1r,0

(olvasóhurok rögzítő)
xo = div($w,2)
v = div($h,2)
yo = add($v,3)

h $xo,$yo z$z_tekercs c$c3 d48.5 jg0.5 np
h $xo,$yo z$z_tekercs c$c4 d48.5 jg-0.5 no_comp np

(antenna)
v = div($wa,2)
xa = sub($xo,$v)
v = div($ha,2)
ya = sub($yo,$v)
d1 = mul($t1d,0.6)
d12 = mul($d1,2)
b inline $xa,$ya size$wa,$ha jg0.5 z$z_tekercs c$c3 ng
b inline $xa,$ya size$wa,$ha z$z_tekercs c$c4 no_comp ng

xa0 = add($xa,$d1)
ya0 = add($ya,$d1)
wa0 = sub($wa,$d12)
ha0 = sub($ha,$d12)
b inline $xa0,$ya0 size$wa0,$ha0  z$z_tekercs c$c4 no_comp ng

xa0 = add($xa0,$d1)
ya0 = add($ya0,$d1)
wa0 = sub($wa0,$d12)
ha0 = sub($ha0,$d12)
b inline $xa0,$ya0 size$wa0,$ha0  z$z_tekercs c$c4 no_comp ng

xa0 = add($xa0,$d1)
ya0 = add($ya0,$d1)
wa0 = sub($wa0,$d12)
ha0 = sub($ha0,$d12)
b inline $xa0,$ya0 size$wa0,$ha0 z$z_tekercs c$c4  no_comp ng

xa0 = add($xa0,$d1)
ya0 = add($ya0,$d1)
wa0 = sub($wa0,$d12)
ha0 = sub($ha0,$d12)
b inline $xa0,$ya0 size$wa0,$ha0 z$z_tekercs c$c4 no_comp ng

xa0 = add($xa0,$d1)
ya0 = add($ya0,$d1)
wa0 = sub($wa0,$d12)
ha0 = sub($ha0,$d12)
b inline $xa0,$ya0 size$wa0,$ha0 z$z_tekercs c$c4  no_comp ng

xa0 = add($xa0,$d1)
ya0 = add($ya0,$d1)
wa0 = sub($wa0,$d12)
ha0 = sub($ha0,$d12)
b inline $xa0,$ya0 size$wa0,$ha0 z$z_tekercs c$c4  no_comp ng

xa0 = add($xa0,$d1)
ya0 = add($ya0,$d1)
wa0 = sub($wa0,$d12)
ha0 = sub($ha0,$d12)
print "wa:$wa0"
print "ha:$ha0"
b inline $xa0,$ya0 size$wa0,$ha0 z$z_tekercs c$c4 no_comp ng

xa0 = add($xa0,$d1)
ya0 = add($ya0,$d1)
ha0 = sub($ha0,$d12)
ya1 = add($ya0,$ha0)

#l $xo,$ya0 $xo,$ya1 z$z_tekercs c$c3 ng
v = add($ya,$ha)
ya1 = sub($v,1.3)
x0 = sub($xo,3)
x1 = add($xo,3)
#zf1 = add($z_tekercs,0.7)
l $x0,$ya1 $x1,$ya1 z$z1 c$c3 ng

(rögzítőfuratok)
h 5,51, z$z1 c$c2 d3 jg0.2 np ns
h 51,51 z$z1 c$c2 d3 jg0.2 np ns

(kábel bevezető)
y0 = add($h, 2)
v = add($ya,$ha)
y1 = sub($v,1)

l $xo,$y0 $xo,$y1 z$z1 c$c3 ns

(led)
ljg = 0.9
ljg2 = div($ljg, 2)
ly0 = 3.5
ly1 = add($ly0, $ljg2)
ly2 = sub($ly0, $ljg2)

l 8,$ly1 16,$ly1 z$z1 c$c2 ns
l 8,$ly2 16,$ly2 z$z1 c$c4 no_comp ns

(beeper forrasztás)
l 46.5,11.5 55,11.5 z$z_tekercs c$c2

y = 4.3
ox = 50
oy = 15.925

y1 = add($y, $d2);
y2 = sub($y, $d2);

x = 3.3

y11 = add($y, 1.85);
y12 = sub($y, 1.85);
x11 = add($x,0.25)
x12 = sub($x,0.25)
l $x11,$y11 $x11,$y12 z$z1 c$c2 ns
l $x12,$y11 $x12,$y12 z$z1 c$c4 no_comp ns

x = add($x, $ox);
y11 = add($y, 1.85);
y12 = sub($y, 1.85);
x11 = add($x,0.25)
x12 = sub($x,0.25)
l $x11,$y11 $x11,$y12 z$z1 c$c2 ns
l $x12,$y11 $x12,$y12 z$z1 c$c4 no_comp ns

y = add($y, $oy);
y1 = add($y, $d2);
y2 = sub($y, $d2);
x = 3.3
y11 = add($y, 1.85);
y12 = sub($y, 1.85);
x11 = add($x,0.25)
x12 = sub($x,0.25)
l $x11,$y11 $x11,$y12 z$z1 c$c2 ns
l $x12,$y11 $x12,$y12 z$z1 c$c4 no_comp ns
x = add($x, $ox);
y11 = add($y, 1.85);
y12 = sub($y, 1.85);
x11 = add($x,0.25)
x12 = sub($x,0.25)
l $x11,$y11 $x11,$y12 z$z1 c$c2 ns
l $x12,$y11 $x12,$y12 z$z1 c$c4 no_comp ns


(körvonal)
b outline 0,0 size$w,$h z$z1 c$c4 g2,0.3,0.7 r3 ns
